verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>
Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

After the doings <S%H4639><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> ye dwelt, <S%H3427><s%> shall ye not <S%H3808><s%> do: <S%H6213><s%> and after the doings <S%H4639><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> whither <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> I <S%H589><s%> bring <S%H935><s%> you, shall ye not <S%H3808><s%> do: <S%H6213><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall ye walk <S%H1980><s%> in their ordinances. <S%H2708><s%>

Ye shall do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> my judgments, <S%H4941><s%> and keep <S%H8104><s%> mine ordinances, <S%H2708><s%> to walk <S%H1980><s%> therein: I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

Ye shall therefore keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and my judgments: <S%H4941><s%> which <S%H834><s%> if a man <S%H120><s%> do, <S%H6213><s%> he shall live <S%H2425><s%> in them: I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

None <S%H3808><s%> <S%H376><s%> <S%H376><s%> of you shall approach <S%H7126><s%> to <S%H413><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> that is near <S%H7607><s%> of kin <S%H1320><s%> to him, to uncover <S%H1540><s%> their nakedness: <S%H6172><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

The nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of thy father, <S%H1><s%> or the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of thy mother, <S%H517><s%> shalt thou not <S%H3808><s%> uncover: <S%H1540><s%> she <S%H1931><s%> is thy mother; <S%H517><s%> thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> uncover <S%H1540><s%> her nakedness. <S%H6172><s%>
The nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of thy father's <S%H1><s%> wife <S%H802><s%> shalt thou not <S%H3808><s%> uncover: <S%H1540><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is thy father's <S%H1><s%> nakedness. <S%H6172><s%>

The nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of thy sister, <S%H269><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of thy father, <S%H1><s%> or <S%H176><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%> of thy mother, <S%H517><s%> whether she be born <S%H4138><s%> at home, <S%H1004><s%> or <S%H176><s%> born <S%H4138><s%> abroad, <S%H2351><s%> even their nakedness <S%H6172><s%> thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> uncover. <S%H1540><s%>

The nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of thy son's <S%H1121><s%> daughter, <S%H1323><s%> or <S%H176><s%> of thy daughter's <S%H1323><s%> daughter, <S%H1323><s%> even their nakedness <S%H6172><s%> thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> uncover: <S%H1540><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> theirs <S%H2007><s%> is thine own nakedness. <S%H6172><s%>

The nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of thy father's <S%H1><s%> wife's <S%H802><s%> daughter, <S%H1323><s%> begotten <S%H4138><s%> of thy father, <S%H1><s%> she <S%H1931><s%> is thy sister, <S%H269><s%> thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> uncover <S%H1540><s%> her nakedness. <S%H6172><s%>

Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> uncover <S%H1540><s%> the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of thy father's <S%H1><s%> sister: <S%H269><s%> she <S%H1931><s%> is thy father's <S%H1><s%> near kinswoman. <S%H7607><s%>

Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> uncover <S%H1540><s%> the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of thy mother's <S%H517><s%> sister: <S%H269><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> she <S%H1931><s%> is thy mother's <S%H517><s%> near kinswoman. <S%H7607><s%>

Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> uncover <S%H1540><s%> the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of thy father's <S%H1><s%> brother, <S%H251><s%> thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> approach <S%H7126><s%> to <S%H413><s%> his wife: <S%H802><s%> she <S%H1931><s%> is thine aunt. <S%H1733><s%>

Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> uncover <S%H1540><s%> the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of thy daughter-in-law: <S%H3618><s%> she <S%H1931><s%> is thy son's <S%H1121><s%> wife; <S%H802><s%> thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> uncover <S%H1540><s%> her nakedness. <S%H6172><s%>
Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> uncover <S%H1540><s%> the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of thy brother's <S%H251><s%> wife: <S%H802><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is thy brother's <S%H251><s%> nakedness. <S%H6172><s%>

Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> uncover <S%H1540><s%> the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of a woman <S%H802><s%> and her daughter, <S%H1323><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shalt thou take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> her son's <S%H1121><s%> daughter, <S%H1323><s%> or her daughter's <S%H1323><s%> daughter, <S%H1323><s%> to uncover <S%H1540><s%> her nakedness; <S%H6172><s%> for they <S%H2007><s%> are her near kinswomen: <S%H7608><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is wickedness. <S%H2154><s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> shalt thou take <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> to <S%H413><s%> her sister, <S%H269><s%> to vex <S%H6887><s%> her, to uncover <S%H1540><s%> her nakedness, <S%H6172><s%> beside <S%H5921><s%> the other in her life <S%H2416><s%> time.

Also thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> approach <S%H7126><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> a woman <S%H802><s%> to uncover <S%H1540><s%> her nakedness, <S%H6172><s%> as long as she is put apart <S%H5079><s%> for her uncleanness. <S%H2932><s%>

Moreover thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> lie carnally <S%H5414><s%> <S%H7903><s%> <S%H2233><s%> with <S%H413><s%> thy neighbor's <S%H5997><s%> wife, <S%H802><s%> to defile <S%H2930><s%> thyself with her.

And thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> let <S%H5414><s%> any of thy seed <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2233><s%> pass through <S%H5674><s%> the fire to Molech, <S%H4432><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shalt thou profane <S%H2490><s%> <S%H853><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of thy God: <S%H430><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> lie <S%H7901><s%> with <S%H854><s%> mankind, <S%H2145><s%> as with <S%H4904><s%> womankind: <S%H802><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is abomination. <S%H8441><s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> shalt thou lie <S%H5414><s%> <S%H7903><s%> with any <S%H3605><s%> beast <S%H929><s%> to defile <S%H2930><s%> thyself therewith: neither <S%H3808><s%> shall any woman <S%H802><s%> stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> a beast <S%H929><s%> to lie down <S%H7250><s%> thereto: it <S%H1931><s%> is confusion. <S%H8397><s%>

Defile not ye yourselves <S%H2930><s%> <S%H408><s%> in any <S%H3605><s%> of these things: <S%H428><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> are defiled <S%H2930><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I <S%H589><s%> cast out <S%H7971><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> you:

And the land <S%H776><s%> is defiled: <S%H2930><s%> therefore I do visit <S%H6485><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> thereof upon <S%H5921><s%> it, and the land <S%H776><s%> itself vomiteth out <S%H6958><s%> <S%H853><s%> her inhabitants. <S%H3427><s%>

Ye <S%H859><s%> shall therefore keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> my statutes <S%H2708><s%> and my judgments, <S%H4941><s%> and shall not <S%H3808><s%> commit <S%H6213><s%> any of these <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H428><s%> abominations; <S%H8441><s%> neither any of your own nation, <S%H249><s%> nor any stranger <S%H1616><s%> that sojourneth <S%H1481><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> you:

(For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H411><s%> abominations <S%H8441><s%> have the men <S%H376><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> done, <S%H6213><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were before <S%H6440><s%> you, and the land <S%H776><s%> is defiled;) <S%H2930><s%>

That the land <S%H776><s%> spew not you out <S%H6958><s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H853><s%> also, when ye defile <S%H2930><s%> it, as <S%H834><s%> it spewed out <S%H6958><s%> <S%H853><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> that <S%H834><s%> were before <S%H6440><s%> you.

For <S%H3588><s%> whosoever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> shall commit <S%H6213><s%> any <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> abominations, <S%H8441><s%> even the souls <S%H5315><s%> that commit <S%H6213><s%> them shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from among <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7130><s%> their people. <S%H5971><s%>

Therefore shall ye keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> mine ordinance, <S%H4931><s%> that ye commit not <S%H6213><s%> <S%H1115><s%> any one of these abominable customs, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2708><s%> <S%H8441><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were committed <S%H6213><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you, and that ye defile not yourselves <S%H2930><s%> <S%H3808><s%> therein: I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>
